title: Whale Watching in Diablo Immortal
description:
Join us as we bust out our phones and apply for a high interest personal loan with Diablo Immortal! How does Blizzard's hack and slash RPG hold up on phones, and how close has it brought us to abject financial ruin? Find out within. 

Games discussed: Diablo Immortal, Resident Evil 4 Remake, Street Fighter 6, Final Fantasy XVI, Soda Crisis, Sniper Elite 5, Super Auto Pets, V Rising
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick)
